name: Popeye the Sailor Man
description: Popeye and his crew are floating around for days! Rescue him so he can eat spinach and get strong again!

name: Robinson Crusoe
description: Robinson with his crew are shipwrecked with his crew and castaway on a remote tropical island for 28 years, give him  a ride home.

name: Sinbad the Sailor
description: Sinbad is shipwrecked after he sets sail with his crew from Basra with merchandise.

name: Captain Nemo
description: Captain Nemo is shipwrecked after leaving The Mysterious Island with his crew, he has been Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Seas for to long.
